long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock Insights and Explore with Recap. 
Recap transforms web content and PDFs into engaging visual summaries, complete with thought-provoking questions from multiple perspectives.
Enhance your Reading/Leaning/Exploration experience intuitively.

Why Recap?
üñºÔ∏è Visual Summaries: More than just text‚ÄîRecap creates visual formats that help you digest and remember information quickly.
üîç Focused Insights: Want more detail on a specific part? Ask questions, and Recap will pull insights from the section you need.
‚è≥ Save Time: Skip the clutter and get straight to the key points from any webpage, PDF, or video.
üåê Works Everywhere: From articles to YouTube videos, Recap transforms content into mindmaps, flowcharts, timelines, tables, and more.

Who‚Äôs It For?
- Students & Educators: Turn lessons, articles, and videos into engaging visuals for easier learning.
- Professionals: Quickly grasp industry reports or business content‚Äîideal for decision-making and presentations.
- Content Creators: Use Recap to gather insights and plan your content with ease.

Go Beyond Summarization
Recap doesn‚Äôt just simplify‚Äîit generates thought-provoking questions from multiple expert perspectives, helping you dive deeper and gain a better understanding of the material.

More Features
- YouTube Support: Summarizes videos with timestamps.
- Dark Mode: Seamless experience for all users.

What‚Äôs Next?
Recap will soon support podcasts, social media, and more! Try Recap for free, and let us know how it helps you!
Thanks for checking us out! üöÄ
